text: Shibuya Station () is a railway station of JR East, Tokyu Corporation, Keio Corporation and the Tokyo Metro in Shibuya, Tokyo, Japan. ==Adjacent stations== ;JR East : Yamanote Line :::Ebisu - Shibuya - Harajuku : Saikyō Line ::Commuter Rapid, Rapid, Local :::Ebisu - Shibuya - Shinjuku Shōnan- Shinjuku Line ::Special Rapid :::Shinjuku - Shibuya - Ōsaki ::Rapid, Local :::Shinjuku - Shibuya - Ebisu ;Tokyu Corporation : Tōyoko Line ::Ltd. Exp., Commuter Ltd. Exp., Express :::Shibuya - Naka-meguro ::Local :::Shibuya - Daikan-yama : Den-en-toshi Line ::Express :::Through to Tokyo Metro Hanzomon Line - Shibuya - Sangen-jaya ::Semi-Express, Local :::Through to Tokyo Metro Hanzomon Line - Shibuya - Ikejiri-ōhashi ;Keio : Inokashira Line ::Expless :::Shibuya - Shimo-Kitazawa ::Local :::Shibuya - Shinsen ;Tokyo Metro : Ginza Line :::Shibuya （G 01） - Omote-sando （G 02） : Hanzomon Line :::Through to Tōkyū Den-en-toshi Line - Shibuya （Z 01） - Omote-sando （Z 02） : Fukutoshin Line ::Express :::Shinjuku-sanchome （F 13） - Shibuya （F 16） ::Local :::Meiji- jingumae （F 15） - Shibuya （F 16） ==Other websites== Category:Railway stations in Tokyo
title: Shibuya Station
